title: Target removes J&J sunscreens from stores, website | Reuters
description: Target removes J&J sunscreens from stores, website | Reuters

title: Intel in talks to buy GlobalFoundries for about $30 billion - WSJ | Reuters
description: Intel Corp (INTC.O) is in talks to buy semiconductor manufacturer GlobalFoundries Inc for about $30 billion, the Wall Street Journal reported on Thursday, citing people familiar with the matter.
